column1: #Text=Zuko says : " I ca n't believe a year ago my purpose in life was hunting you down .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Yeah , we are friends .
#Text=" Aang says : " I ca n't believe a year ago I was still frozen in a block of ice .
#Text=" Zuko says : " And it 's gon na be even more different ... when we build it together .
